name: Hustl.it
description: Hustl.it is an intelligent timeline tool for smart, aggressive, energetic & on the go hustlers to save time & eventually money by aggregating multiple calendars and overlapping it for participants’ time availability to suggest meeting location based on the intelligent least time to travel algorithm

team.name: Vikas Agarwal
team.bioHtml:
Founder
With a knack for technology and a strong entrepreneurial spirit I have effectively launched and managed numerous digital  start-ups

jobs.title: CEO / Co-Founder
jobs.description: We are looking for a Co-Founder who can scale the business and can help in raising funds. The Technology is already ready and MVP is already launched. we are still iterating the value proposition as per the feedback from early customers.
